programme.title: Absolution
programme.desc: A hitman comes across a young woman being hunted by a crime boss who kidnaps and tortures trafficked women.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: LaKeisha takes a stand of her own while Ghost, Tommy, Tasha, and Angela race to prove their innocence.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Ghost seeks vengeance due to the ill will of Tommy Egan. Tasha vows to get even with Ghost.

programme.title: Black Sails
programme.desc: Flint pushes Silver to his limit. As Nassau prepares to repel an invasion, Rackham takes the reins.

programme.title: Black Sails
programme.desc: Civilization returns to Nassau, and sets its sights on Vane. Flint, Silver and Billy encounter a new enemy.

programme.title: Detective Knight: Rogue
programme.desc: Chasing bandits from L.A. to New York, Knight crashes into his dark past, imperiling his case…and his life.

programme.title: Detective Knight: Redemption
programme.desc: Knight deals out both mercy and justice – on his terms – when the city is terrorized by The Christmas Bomber.

programme.title: Detective Knight: Independence
programme.desc: A vigilante hits close to Knight’s home when he threatens to blow up the city’s Fourth of July festivities.

programme.title: Mob Land
programme.desc: A sheriff tries to keep the peace when a man robs a pill mill, alerting an enforcer for the New Orleans mafia.

programme.title: The Son of No One
programme.desc: A cop is assigned to the neighborhood where he grew up, where an old secret threatens to destroy his family.
